definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: This paper reports a new method of tryptophan clearance technique to measure hepatic blood flow non-invasively.
sentences.chinese: 報道用色氨酸清除技術檢測犬肝血流量。

sentences.english: Tryptophan works when your stomach is empty, not when your stomach is very full.
sentences.chinese: 色氨酸在你空腹，而非飽腹的時候工作。

sentences.english: Control subjects were given drinks that contained tryptophan.
sentences.chinese: 而給另一組的飲料中含有色氨酸。

sentences.english: Potatoes are able to clean acid that can disrupt the performance of tryptophan in the body.
sentences.chinese: 土豆可以清除那些在身體中擾亂色氨酸工作的酸。

sentences.english: It's a great natural source of melatonin, the sleep hormone, as well as tryptophan.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉富含褪黑激素，和色氨酸一樣，也能促進睡眠。

sentences.english: The time-honored tradition, of course, is warm milk, also a good source of tryptophan.
sentences.chinese: 經久不衰的嘗試是喝熱牛奶，其中同樣含有色氨酸。

sentences.english: The cat cannot synthesise sufficient nicotinic acid from tryptophan.
sentences.chinese: 貓無法從色氨酸中合成足夠的煙酸。

sentences.english: Controls did not have a difference in symptomatology on either day.
sentences.chinese: 對照組在色氨酸增加期與缺失期沒有明顯差別。

sentences.english: Dairy foods contain tryptophan, which is a sleep-promoting substance.
sentences.chinese: 奶製品中含有的色氨酸是種有助增進睡眠的物質。

sentences.english: Turkey meat is an excellent source for tryptophan.
sentences.chinese: 火雞肉是絕佳的色氨酸來源。

sentences.english: The fluorescence of tryptophan residue in BSA was quenched by benzoate.
sentences.chinese: 白蛋白中色氨酸殘基的熒光被苯甲酸鈉淬滅。

sentences.english: Walnuts are a good source of tryptophan, a sleep-enhancing amino acid.
sentences.chinese: 核桃富含色氨酸，這是一種能促進睡眠的氨基酸。

sentences.english: Once in the brain, the tryptophan is converted to serotonin.
sentences.chinese: 一旦進入大腦，色氨酸會被轉化成血清素。

sentences.english: Everyone knows tryptophan as a buzzword you hear a lot around Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 一到感恩節，色氨酸象漂亮的口號，人人都知道。

sentences.english: It contains a lot of tryptophan, manganese, iron, protein and selenium.
sentences.chinese: 它含有很多色氨酸，錳，鐵，蛋白質和硒等元素。

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
